title: DrinkChai
overview: In a startup, caffeine is required in large doses, so working with a tipping point tea-centric company was thoroughly enjoyable.
We pulled upon our long standing e-commerce experice to put together a complex and fully custom order fullfillment and credit card processing solution.

The design and user experience development for this project was and still is being scrutinized.  A/B and multivariate testing was an obvious must, and the attention to detail necessary satisfied our thirst.  Look for a launch end of June!
specs: Elegant degredation of CSS3/HTML5 using Modernizr
